Since the Bay isn't letting me update the information on this site... =/

This small Wii Wad package contains all you need to get free DLC for Rock Band 2, The Beatles: Rock Band, Green Day: Rock Band, and Rock Band 3.

If you don't know how to install wads on a Wii, google is your friend.

For RB3 users, this will allow you to import Green Day: Rock Band without an import code, as well as all of your legacy DLC from RB2.

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask: i check my torrent's comments often.
